title: VELVET COAT WITH PRINT
desc: Knee-length coat made from soft cotton velvet. This garment features a placed, multicoloured Paisley foliage print on the body and sleeves, as well as a matching tie belt.• Regular fit• Lapel collar• Side slip pockets• Fastened with detachable belt• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
